channel.title: Voicemail on Leif Madsen.
channel.description: Recent content in Voicemail on Leif Madsen.

item.title: Asterisk IMAP and Gmail
item.description: Today I was working on the next edition of the Asterisk book and wanted to see if I could get Asterisk IMAP voicemail support to work with Gmail. I had tried doing this a few times in the past without success, but since I had spent some time documenting and testing against Dovecot last week for another client and gotten everything working, I figured I had a good base to start trying to connect to the Gmail IMAP servers.
